column1: "Today I felt very productive and happy with the progress on my project."
"Feeling anxious about the upcoming presentation. Need to prepare more."
"Neutral day overall. Just went through the motions without much emotion."
"Had a fight with a friend. Feeling upset and angry."
"Went for a walk and cleared my mind. Feeling calm and relaxed now."
"You're on a great track — try to continue these habits!"
"Tough days happen — consider writing what made today hard."
"Neutral days are perfect for setting intentions."
"Try to find one small good thing from today
"Your positive mindset is your strength. Keep it going!"
